dynamicProducts.title: Matte
description: Matte offers a smooth and even texture that’s pleasing to touch.
It helps conceal minor surfaces defects like scratches and dents from plastering.
absence of reflection reduces glare, making it suitable for spaces with natural light.
the reflection it provides makes matte surface easy for the eyes.
offers a modern and elegant look for interior designs.

dynamicProducts.title: Eggshell
description: Offers soft, low-Luster finish.
Resistant to scruff, stain and minor wears making it suitable for high level areas.
Relatively easy to clean.
Help conceal minor surface defect due to its low reflectivity.
It strike a balance between matte and glossy.
Mildew-resistant finish.

dynamicProducts.title: Acrylic Matte
description: Provides smoother finish making it ideal for artwork and displays.
Dries relatively quicker, allowing efficiently laying colors without waiting for extended dry time.
Resists scuffing and burnishing.
Unparalleled color depth and richness with smooth, uniform color.
Mildew-resistant finish.

dynamicProducts.title: Satin
description: It provides a subtle shine
It very resistant to moisture, making it suitable for various surfaces.
It relatively easy to clean and maintain.
Satin tends to resist fingerprint and smudges well than higher gloss finishes.
It also a very versatile finish that spreads well over walls, woodwork and even furniture.
It produces less glare than high-gloss finishes making it suitable for areas with lighting.
Seamless touch-ups.
Mildew-resistant finish.

dynamicProducts.title: Exterior Matte
description: Provides a smooth, muted finish that help to hide defects on the surfaces.
Reduces glares from sunlight.
Offers understated look that can enhance the overall aesthetic of the exterior of a building.
Allows bold tones stand out in a vibrant manners.
